text: The "State Anthem of the Latvian SSR" (, was the anthem of Latvia from 1945 to 1990. After 1990, the original anthem, "Dievs, svÄ“tÄ« Latviju!" ("God, bless Latvia") was used. ==Lyrics== Latvian original IPA transcription Russian translation English translation Å ai zemÄ“ visdÄrgÄ mÄ“s brÄ«vÄ«bu guvÄm, Te paaudÅ¾u paaudzÄ“m laimÄ«gam dzimt, Te Å¡alc mÅ«su jÅ«ra, te zied mÅ«su druvas, Te skan mÅ«su pilsÄ“tas, RÄ«ga te dimd. Ğ’ĞµÑ€Ğ½Ñ‹ Ğ¼Ñ‹ Ğ²ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ²Ğµ Ğ˜ ĞºÑ€Ğ¾Ğ²ÑŒ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ½ĞµÑ‘, ĞµÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ´Ğ¾, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒÑ‘Ğ¼! ğ„† Ğ¡Ğ»Ğ°Ğ²ÑŒÑÑ Ğ¡Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ›Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğ°ÑˆĞ°, Ğ¯Ñ€ĞºĞ¾ Ğ² ÑĞ¾Ğ·Ğ²ĞµĞ·Ğ´ÑŒĞ¸ Ñ€ĞµÑĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğº ÑĞ¸ÑĞ¹! ğ„‡ In dearest land we gained our freedom, Generation upon generation are happily born here, Here our sea rustles, here our fields bloom, Here our cities ring, here Riga resounds. May Soviet Latvia live forever, May the Soviet crown shine bright! We rose to break the chains of slavery, Every place still tells of centuries of struggle, Only in brotherhood with the people of great Russia We became a revolutionary force. May Soviet Latvia live forever, May the Soviet crown shine bright! On Lenin's road to happiness and glory, Let's carry the flag of October forever. We will protect our own Soviet Fatherland, With the last drop of our blood. ğ„† May Soviet Latvia live forever, May the Soviet crown shine bright! ğ„‡ ==References== Category:Anthems of Soviet Socialist Republics Category:National symbols of Latvia
title: Anthem of the Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic
